title: Eco-Conscious Modern Duplex with Panoramic Views in Zakopane Centrum
description: Step inside this spacious duplex that stands out with its panoramic windows showcasing the mountain landscape, and modern, energy-efficient lighting throughout. Four inviting bedrooms and two stylish bathrooms (including a guest bathroom) provide ample space for your family and pets. Enjoy exclusive access to a swimming pool for year-round wellness and a dedicated private parking spot for your convenience. This 148 sqm home brings comfort and sustainability together, just moments from the heartbeat of Zakopane.
neighborhood_description: Centrally located in Zakopane’s Centrum neighborhood, you’ll admire the harmony of historic charm blended with modern development. Enjoy peaceful strolls, being close to essential schools and cultural sights, while swiftly accessing city attractions via well-connected public transport and highway options. Eco-aware city dwellers will appreciate a setting that supports both convenience and a green-conscious lifestyle.
lifestyle_benefits: proximity to parks and city walks
safe, private parking for family vehicles
target_buyer: Perfect for eco-conscious families or couples with pets seeking a blend of modern comfort and traditional mountain town vibe, in a central yet peaceful environment.
market_positioning: This property occupies a rare niche in the Zakopane market: modern, spacious duplexes in the heart of the city rarely come with such comprehensive amenities and eco-friendly touches. Attractive to buyers looking for turnkey mountain living in a thriving community close to everything.
